remarks: The converse of the lattice translation of an atom is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2012.)
statement:
ltrnatb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnatb.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnatb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnatb.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrncnvatb $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ P e. B ) -> ( P e. A <-> ( `' F ` P ) e. A ) ) $.
